title: Compliance of private ventilated improved pit latrines to odour and fly control guidelines: A technical audit in selected regions of Ghana
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Panin Asirifua Obeng, Emmanuel Amponsah Donkor, Eric Awere, Sampson Oduro-Kwarteng, Peter Appiah Obeng, Esi Awuah
